inclusion.criterion: Inflammatory bowel disease diagnosed at least 6 months ago
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Failure of either one immunomodulator of at least 3 months duration, or TNF inhibitor
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: full induction treatment, or corticosteroids, or intolerance to either of these drugs.
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Currently active disease, partial Mayo score ≥4 for ulcerative colitis, or CDAI ≥200
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: negative HIV , Human T-cell leukemia virus I/II, negative stool culture, Negative C diff toxin, negative Cytomegalovirus
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Active infection in either the donor or the recipient,
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: The patient is a 60-year-old woman admitted to the stroke department with a recent history of a second course of intravenous antibiotics for aspiration pneumonia. She has active infection and no informed consent.
